subject: Tennis
BNP Paribas Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams eased into the fourth round of the BNP Paribas Open, beating Zarina Diyas of Kazakhstan, 6-2, 6-0, in 53 minutes.
snippet: Serena Williams eased into the fourth round of the BNP Paribas Open, beating Zarina Diyas of Kazakhstan, 6-2, 6-0, in 53 minutes.
